title: (x) Facundo Gonzales decorative serif ID - source typeface of Nalle's Mazarin {Nina}
content:
Hi. I saw this on an album cover and I was wondering if anyone knows what it is? Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202021441im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_3920.jpg)
author: Biff

comments.content:
Does this ever look phototype-y. :-)  
Scriptorium has Mazarin, which looks like a not-very-good digitization:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/mazarin/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202021441/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/mazarin/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/mazarin/")  
Dunno, maybe somebody knows of a better one?
